All Classes

Class
Description
AggregatePrint
An abstract class defining an object that does three things: 1) Processes an ungrouped array of objects including MenuItems 2) Aggregates MenuItems with Quantity.
Discount
An abstract class defining a discount.
DiscountApp
A class representing the Discount App used to interact with the entire discount array.
ErrorApp
Class used to handle System input from users while handling exceptions.
FlatDiscount
A class representing a flat discount.
IO
Handles writing to and reading from external files
Menu
Represents a menu that contains a list of menu items and promotions
MenuApp
Menu Application to process Menu operations
MenuItem
Represents a menu item that can be stored in the catalog or in menus.
Order
A class to define attributes and methods specific to a single order.
OrderApp
Represents the Order App class that stores all active orders and provides methods to interface with all orders
OrderInvoice
The order invoice class, this pertains to a particular record/transaction
OrderInvoiceApp
Represents the Order Invoice App class that is responsible for 1) Processing a single OrderInvoice 2) GROUPING THE SALE ITEMS WITH QUANTITY 3) Printing it in the Order Invoice format.
PercentDiscount
A class representing a percent discount.
Promotion
Represents a special type of menu item called a Promotion, which is a set package of menu items at a single price
Reservation
Represents the Reservation that can be made.
ReservationApp
The list of tables which the restaurant has.
RRPSS
The Restaurant Reservation and Point of Sale System
RW
All objects that require writing to and reading from external files need to implement this interface
SalesReportApp
Represents the Sales Report App class that is responsible for 1) Receiving the order invoices 2) Allowing the user to choose the time period for the reservation 3) GROUPING THE SALE ITEMS WITH QUANTITY 4) Printing it in the Order Invoice format.
Staff
The staff class to create the staff members of the restaurant
Staff.Gender
The gender options that any Staff person can take on
StaffApp
The Staff Application to deal with operations relating to managing Staff objects
Table
Represents the Table object in the restaurant
Taxes
A class to define and apply taxes.
